ValidationRule.description: Only in the event of a Ticket being "New" can the owner be a queue. If status is not "New', a ticket owner must be assigned. DEACTIVATED US-0009322 - Enhance support queue
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( LEFT(RecordTypeId,15) <>"0123u0000019nl0", OR ( ISCHANGED(Status) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , "New")) && LEFT(OwnerId, 3) = '00G', ISNEW() && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , "New")), false ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Owner is currently a Queue. Please assign this ticket to yourself before working on it.
